column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////one bite into the deep dish and i was SOLD. it was PACKED with fresh
column2: gooey cheese and the toppings were so savory and flavorful! Also
column3: the crust was just thick enough to still feel like a crust but have the texture of really tender bread. and one bite into the crustless pizza
column4: my boyfriend was in HEAVEN! he ate almost the entire pizza by himself! the sausages were molded into crust form
column5: and it was packed tight with cheese
column6: with additional mushroom and peppers on top! it was some legitimate sausage crust
column7: and definitely one of the most innovative pizzas I've ever had! it had about twice the flavor of the deep dish pizza
column8: but that's probably because the sausages are super salty and there is no bread to mediate... INTENSE STUFF!
